titles.title: Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Act of 2005
For the relief of Alemseghed Mussie Tesfamical.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/10/2005--Introduced. Makes Alemseghed Mussie Tesfamical eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
